title: BONUS: Velvet's Edge: The Consequences of TV Cheating with Caroline Bryan
itunes:title: BONUS: Velvet's Edge: The Consequences of TV Cheating with Caroline Bryan
description:
Kelly sits down with Caroline Bryan, wife of country music superstar Luke Bryan. Caroline spills the details on how she and Luke met and what her first impression was (which may be different than what you think). She also gets real about the anxiety she has faced after losing several family members and how starting a charity, The Brett Boyer Foundation, has helped her grieve and heal from those loses. She also gives her top marriage advice and the one thing she and Luke do monthly to keep their relationship healthy and alive. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
